title: 1 credit course
content: Will 2nd year CSE have saturday online classes like in first year? If yes which are those subjects

comments.body: Yes We Had it for 1.5 Hours 3 Saturdays a Month
We don't have any 1 credit courses from the second year.. special topics are two credit courses which are held for 2 hours 15 minutes on one day during the week. No online classes.
So will the total credits in a semester be 24? Are they totally irrelevant like EVS and constitution or related what are subject names ?
Yes 24 credits. Our batch had C++, R and Unix shell programming as options for special topics. They are not totally irrelevant. However they are not taught to depth either.
